summary: Solutions-oriented IT professional with leadership experience managing a 24x7x365 IT organization and large SaaS environments.

experience.title: Director of Information Technology
experience.description: Designed and deployed the first data center and an enterprise SaaS offering; established cyber security policies; built and led teams for data center operations and technical support. Implemented a hybrid cloud environment in 2008 and drove recurring revenue through SaaS.

experience.title: Information Technology Manager
experience.description: Managed a +$120M IT program supporting County Wide Human Service programs. Led a bi-county steering committee for RFP releases and selections; oversaw the 2.5M system rollout for ~2000 users; supervised network design, security, and support teams.

experience.title: Information Technology Manager
experience.description: Managed national POS network across 100+ retail locations and 5 distribution centers; oversaw ERP at manufacturing plant and accounting/HR systems; liaison between vendors, operations, and CFO; responsible for Cisco routers/firewalls, Windows Server, and desktop support.

education.degree: Master of Science in Information Technology
education.school: California State University, Fullerton (CSUF) â€“ Mihaylo College of Business and Economics

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
